alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern York , the City of Poquoson, the City of Hampton and the central City of Newport News through 615 PM EDT... At 533 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tabb, or near Langley AFB, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Langley AFB, Seaford, Patrick Henry Field, Northampton, Denbigh, Tabb, Beaconsdale, Grand View, Fox Hill, Langley View, Oriana, Hilton Village, Dare, Oyster Point, Messick, Hornsbyville, Harris Grove and Plum Tree Island Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
